thread.title: Life | Take a deep breath - Eddie Rocket's is coming to petrol stations around the country
thread.title_full: Life | Take a deep breath - Eddie Rocket's is coming to petrol stations around the country - entertainment.ie

author: David O'Shaughnessy
title: Life | Take a deep breath - Eddie Rocket's is coming to petrol stations around the country
text:
Congratulations, your hangovers just got immeasurably more bearable.
No longer will you have to trek to the nearest town or busy shopping centre to get your hands on a sweet, delicious hangover cure because today petrol station chain Topaz announced that they are to introduce Eddie Rocket's to 40 forecourts around the country in an â‚¬11.4m investment.
But before you get too excited, they're not all coming at once. The rollout will happen over seven years and will see petrol station forecourts housing the 'Rocket's by Eddie Rocket's' chain for hungry motorists/patrons.
The first outlet opened last week in Douglas, Co. Cork, with further outlets opening in service stations in Dublin Port and Brennanstown, Co. Wicklow before the end of the year and 15 more opening in 2016.
No word yet on where these will be, so say a little prayer to the great god of burgers in the sky that it's the Topaz nearest to you and sweat greasy relief will set up shop mere minutes away.
Via Newstalk
